unittitle_ssm: James and Rachel Fowler and Silas Carpenter correspondence
abstract_ssm: This collection includes 9 letters written by James and Rachel Fowler of Kings County, N.Y. to Silas Carpenter, dated 1789-1806. The letters primarily concern personal and family matters.
collection_ssm: James and Rachel Fowler and Silas Carpenter correspondence
heading_ssm: James and Rachel Fowler and Silas Carpenter correspondence

collection_sim: James and Rachel Fowler and Silas Carpenter correspondence
